scripts._comment_packaging: Use package:chrome for Chrome Web Store submission. Excludes dev files like doc/, docs/, eslint.config.js, CLAUDE.md, etc.
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run docs
scripts.package: web-ext build --source-dir=. --artifacts-dir=build --ignore-files=node_modules package*.json tsconfig.json typedoc.json analysis-reports archive performance-test.html tests jest.config.js coverage eslint.config.js CLAUDE.md README.md doc docs Diagram after_doc temp_end.js chrome-extension.tar.gz dist build .git .github .vscode final-function-verification function-tests reports claude-workspace claude-extensions Chrome_Web_Store_Policy_Compliance_Report.md
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build && npm run package:clean
scripts.package:legacy: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.package:clean: npm run create-release-dir && npm run package:minimal
scripts.create-release-dir: if exist release rmdir /s /q release && mkdir release
scripts.copy-essential-files: copy manifest.json release\ && copy background.js release\ && copy content.js release\ && copy popup.html release\ && copy popup.js release\ && xcopy css release\css\ /e /i && xcopy icons release\icons\ /e /i /exclude:exclude.txt && xcopy js release\js\ /e /i /exclude:exclude.txt && xcopy lib release\lib\ /e /i
scripts.create-exclude-file: echo .DS_Store > exclude.txt && echo .backup >> exclude.txt && echo *.backup >> exclude.txt && echo toolbar.js.backup >> exclude.txt && echo toolbar\ >> exclude.txt
scripts.package:minimal: npm run create-release-dir && npm run create-exclude-file && npm run copy-essential-files && web-ext build --source-dir=release --artifacts-dir=build --filename=markdown_viewer_with_mermaid-minimal-{version}.zip
scripts.clean: if exist build rmdir /s /q build && if exist web-ext-artifacts rmdir /s /q web-ext-artifacts && if exist coverage rmdir /s /q coverage && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && if exist release rmdir /s /q release
